## utils.dom.startTextWidthCache() function

Start caching text widths. Every call to this function MUST also call stopTextWidthCache. Caches must not survive between execution threads.  Blockly.utils.dom.startTextWidthCache

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function startTextWidthCache(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void
